synopsis.text:
On a vibrant July 7th, amidst the joyous Tanabata festival, Shidou Itsuka crosses paths with the notorious Kurumi Tokisaki, a spirit feared as the worst of her kind. To his surprise, she requests an impromptu date, and despite his initial hesitation, Shidou agrees. As they explore the festival, visiting a captivating planetarium and indulging in local delicacies, Shidou can't help but notice Kurumi's unexpectedly gentle demeanor.

Meanwhile, Shidou's friends Tohka Yatogami, Yoshino, and Kotori Itsuka embark on their own festival adventure, all the while searching for their missing companion.

As the day unfolds, the couple finds themselves drawn to a mock wedding ceremony, offering Kurumi the chance to don a stunning wedding dress. While Shidou grapples with the enigmatic nature of his date, he begins to unravel the truth behind Kurumi's unanticipated sweetness.

This standalone episode, originally bundled with the third volume of the Date A Live: Encore light novel, offers a fresh perspective on Kurumi's character and a delightful adventure set against the backdrop of the Tanabata festival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
